title: Gnome cooking

properties.name: description
properties.value: Gnome cooking is a specialised part of the Cooking skill that is available to members. Cooking tutorials from Aluft Gianne snr. and Blurberry are not required, but they can teach the player how to cook gnome food and gnome cocktails respectively. These tutorials are required to start the Gnome Restaurant minigame, Gianne jnr. will request recommendations from both of them before it is possible to begin.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Gnome cookingThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:Gnome cooking

Gnome cooking is a specialised part of the Cooking skill that is available to members. Cooking tutorials from Aluft Gianne snr. and Blurberry are not required, but they can teach the player how to cook gnome food and gnome cocktails respectively. These tutorials are required to start the Gnome Restaurant minigame, Gianne jnr. will request recommendations from both of them before it is possible to begin.

Special equipment and ingredients are required for gnomish cooking, but players can obtain all these items either by purchasing from Hudo or Heckel Funch, or by picking up respawns around the Grand Tree in the Tree Gnome Stronghold.

Some gnomebowls are useful for Ironman as they heal up to 15 and are easily accessible, with the benefit opposed to warriors guild being, less players are buying up stock.

Like standard cooking, players may burn various gnome cuisine. Burning gnome cuisine stops entirely at level 38.

Contents

  • 1 Types of gnome cooking
    • 1.1 Crunchies
    • 1.2 Battas
    • 1.3 Gnomebowls
    • 1.4 Cocktails

Types of gnome cooking[edit | edit source]

All gnomish baked goods require players to add Gianne dough to the mould and then bake it. The item changes from being 'raw' to 'half cooked'. It is then time to add the other ingredients. Cooking experience is gained in three stages. Cooking any raw mould provides 30 cooking experience, and varying amounts are gained for preparing the different foods and adding the finishing touches.

Crunchies[edit | edit source]

There are four different crunchies that players can make. Preparing any crunchies provides 40 experience, and a varying amount of experience is gained for adding the finishing touches.

Cooking Level Type Premade Basic Ingredients Use on unfinished moulds Experience
10 Toad crunchies Premade t'd crunch 2 toad legs, 1 gnome spice
2 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 equa leaves
1 x 		100
12 Spicy crunchies Premade s'y crunch 2 equa leaves, 1 gnome spice
2 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 gnome spice
1 x 		102
14 Worm crunchies Premade w'm crun' 2 king worms, 1 gnome spice, 1 equa leaves
2 x 1 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 gnome spice
1 x 		104
16 Chocchip crunchies Premade ch' crunch 2 chocolate bar, 1 gnome spice
2 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 chocolate dust
1 x 		106

Battas[edit | edit source]

There are five different battas that players can make. Preparing any batta provides 40 experience, and a varying amount of experience is gained for adding the finishing touches.

Cooking Level Type Premade Basic Ingredients Use on unfinished moulds Experience
25 Fruit batta Premade fr't batta 4 equa leaves, 1 lime chunks, 1 orange chunks, 1 pineapple chunks
4 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 gnome spice
1 x 		150
26 Toad batta Premade t'd batta 1 equa leaves, 1 gnome spice, 1 cheese, 1 toad legs
1 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 		Bake 152
27 Worm batta Premade w'm batta 1 king worms, 1 cheese, 1 gnome spice
1 x 1 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 equa leaves
1 x 		154
28 Vegetable batta Premade veg batta 2 tomatoes, 1 dwellberries, 1 onion, 1 cheese, 1 cabbage
2 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 equa leaves
1 x 		156
29 Cheese and tomato batta Premade c+t batta 1 tomato, 1 cheese
1 x 1 x

Bake, 1 equa leaves
1 x

158

Gnomebowls[edit | edit source]

There are four different gnomebowls that players can make. Preparing any gnomebowl provides 50 experience, and a varying amount of experience is gained for adding the finishing touches.

Cooking Level Type Premade Basic Ingredients Use on unfinished moulds Experience
30 Worm hole Premade worm hole 4 king worms, 2 onions, 1 gnome spice
4 x 2 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 equa leaves
1 x 		170
35 Vegetable ball Premade veg ball 2 onion, 2 potatoes, 1 gnome spice
2 x 2 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 equa leaves
1 x 		175
40 Tangled toads' legs Premade ttl 4 toad's legs, 1 gnome spice, 2 cheese, 1 dwellberries, 2 equa leaves
4 x 1 x 2 x 1 x 2 x 		Bake 185
42 Chocolate bomb Premade choc bomb 4 chocolate bars, 1 equa leaves
4 x 1 x 		Bake, 1 chocolate dust, 2 pot of cream
1 x 2x 		190

Cocktails[edit | edit source]

Cooking Level Type Premade Basic Ingredients Have in inventory when pouring Experience
6 Fruit blast Premade fr' blast 1 pineapple, 1 lemon, 1 orange
1 x 1 x 1 x 		1 lemon slices
1 x 		50
8 Pineapple punch Premade p' punch 2 pineapple, 1 lemon, 1 orange
2 x 1 x 1 x 		1 lime chunks, 1 pineapple chunks, 1 orange slices
1 x 1 x 1 x 		70
18 Wizard blizzard Premade wiz blz'd 2 vodka, 1 gin, 1 lime, 1 lemon, 1 orange
2 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 		1 pineapple chunks, 1 sliced lime
1 x 1 x 		110
20 Short green guy Premade sgg 1 vodka, 3 limes
1 x 3 x 		1 sliced lime, 1 equa leaves
1 x 1 x 		120
32 Drunk dragon Premade dr' dragon 1 vodka, 1 gin, 1 dwellberries
1 x 1 x 1 x 		1 pineapple chunks, 1 pot of cream, Heat
1 x 1 x 		160
33 Choc saturday Premade choc s'dy 1 whisky, 1 chocolate bar, 1 equa leaves, 1 bucket of milk
1 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 		Heat, 1 chocolate dust, 1 pot of cream
1 x 1 x 		170
37 Blurberry special Premade blurb' sp. 1 vodka, 1 brandy, 1 gin, 2 lemons, 1 orange
1 x 1 x 1 x 2 x 1 x 		1 lemon chunks, 1 orange chunks, 1 equa leaves, 1 sliced lime
1 x 1 x 1 x 1 x 		180
